content: Jun.-Prof. Dr. Panagiotis Bouros | Data Management Skip to contentNavigationsstrukturAn Interactive Interface for Road Network GenerationAn Interface for Generating and Visualizing Geosocial NetworksSimulation-based Evacuation Planning for Urban AreasAn Interactive Tool for Evaluating Choices and Changes in Transportation NetworksJun.-Prof. Dr. Panagiotis BourosHead of the Data Management research group E-Mail: bouros@uni-mainz.de Room: 03-121 Phone: +49 (0) 6131 39 23603 Personal Homepage: https://pbour.github.io Research Interests My research interests are with in-memory data management and query processing with a special focus on complex data types including spatial, temporal, text and graph data.
